page.title: 17SOUTHERN BURWELL HOUSING.
page.content: In 1985 there were around{330 houses {in}the{southern}part of{Burwell.}Most of these are{privately owned.}There {are}very few council houses. In{Reach}and{Swaffham Prior}most houses are privately owned though there is{some council housing}around Fairview. Some people have built their own homes because they thought it would be cheaper than to buy one.For instance one couple chose a site because it's by the river with ducks coming on the lawn.They used roughly 24,000 bricks which were Severn Valley weather stock. They had help from a friend and from a bricklayer.An architect they knew drew up the plans. Such a{self_built,semi_detached house made between{1980_85}could cost {Â£60,000.
